title: DAD DISASTERS, PART 2: Deleted Scenes
description:
SHOW NOTES

A tour through dads of the western canon, featuring its three most prominent pillars:  Greek mythology, the Bible, and Star Wars

The danger of making your own energy-efficient garage door

Spencer does an accent again, sorry

We were fighting the audio haint for much of this recording and as a result accidentally glossed over Jason inventing NASA Applebees but that’s our trademark

Why sparkler disasters are better than other fireworks disasters

Visit sunny preownedairboats.com



Learn more about your ad choices. Visit megaphone.fm/adchoices

content:encoded:
SHOW NOTES

  • A tour through dads of the western canon, featuring its three most prominent pillars:  Greek mythology, the Bible, and Star Wars
  • The danger of making your own energy-efficient garage door
  • Spencer does an accent again, sorry
  • We were fighting the audio haint for much of this recording and as a result accidentally glossed over Jason inventing NASA Applebees but that’s our trademark
